channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- CAPI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- CAPI

item.title: CVE-2019-3785|2024-09-17T01:56:39.503Z -- cloud%20foundry -- capi
item.description: Cloud Foundry Cloud Controller, versions prior to 1.78.0, contain an endpoint with improper authorization. A remote authenticated malicious user with read permissions can request package information and receive a signed bit-service url that grants the user write permissions to the bit-service.
